availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Giboney (Casey Co, Ky, captain (U.S.A.))

body.p: Casey County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew Giboney and Lydia Giboney. Resident in Casey County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Casey County in 1860. Served in 13th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as captain from December 23, 1863, to January 10, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Casey County, District 2, p. 325B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Casey County, District 1, p. 475.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 354.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 923.
KYR-0002-222-013.
